name: Vessels 152: BERT ‘THE HELP’
description: Every crew needs someone to be the brains of the operation. The man with the plan. The guy who sees all the angles and is always one step ahead of the competition. Bert isn’t that guy. He’s more of the person who carries heavy stuff for that guy, makes the tea for that guy and does any photocopying and light admin work for that guy. As part of a crew of risk-taking adventurers, Bert’s job tends to involve more carrying heavy stuff than photocopying, but make no mistake… this guy can get hold of
